snippet: The two nations have been locked in a tense dispute over borders, territory and oil since the south split off and became its own country 18 months ago.
lead_paragraph: The two nations have been locked in a tense dispute over borders, territory and oil since the south split off and became its own country 18 months ago.

headline.seo: Leaders of Sudan and South Sudan in Ethiopia for Talks
headline.main: Leaders of Sudan and South Sudan in Ethiopia for Talks
headline.print_headline: Leaders of Sudan and South Sudan in Ethiopia for Talks
